text: Gerardo Mej√≠a (born April 16, 1965), better known by his mononym Gerardo, is an Ecuadorian-born American singer, rapper and actor. He gained wide visibility with his 1990s hit song "Rico Suave", and later became a recording industry executive and a Christian pastor. ==Related pages== *Roc Project *Billy Squier *Norman Greenbaum *John Cafferty and the Beaver Brown Band *Jeffrey Osborne *Marky Mark and the Funky Bunch Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian people Category:American singers Category:American rappers Category:American actors
title: Gerardo (musician)
